TITLE: TANT-Lab Tools
SUBTITLE: for digital methods
MESSAGE: A curated list of tools for the social science and digital humanities proposed by the Techno-Anthropology Lab of Aalborg University.
HYPHE_LIST:
• Harvest web data
  • Group pages as web entities
  • Network of hyperlinks
  • Expand and curate your corpus
MANYLINES_LIST:
• Upload your network
  • Simplified analysis
  • Build a narrative
  • Publish online
TCAT_LIST:
• Capture a tweets dataset
  • Refine in different ways
  • Visualize and analyze
  • Export tables or networks
